items.title: 3 killed in 3rd US strike on alleged drug boat in international waters, Trump says
items.description: President Donald Trump said Friday he ordered another strike against a boat in international waters that he said was "trafficking illicit narcotics."

items.title: 4 arrested in alleged hate crime attack on transgender woman: Police
items.description: "During the assault, the victim says the suspects made homophobic remarks to her," police said.
